subject: Re: FB # 80
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Rick,

Not sure if your just ignoring my requests or not.  I want to listen to your files, however your link goes to your homepage and then i surf around but cannot find exactly what you are raving about.

Maybe you can just post some audio clips on here or a direct link to the actual pages that contain the material you are writing about.

Thanks again,
-Steve
